tool.name: CMFinder_v0
tool.help: cmfinder.pl [options] SEQ Options: -b Do not use BLAST search to locate anchors -v Verbose. Print running information, and save intermediate results. -c <number> The maximum number of candidates in each sequence. Default 40. No bigger than 100. -m <number> The minimum length of candidates. Default 30 -M <number> The maximum length of candidates. Default 100 -n <number> The maximum number of output motifs. Default 3 -f <number> The fraction of the sequences expected to contain the motif. Default 0.80 -s <number> The number of stem-loops in the motif -h Show this list
